Uses of Interface
com.persistit.logging.PersistitLogger

  • Packages that use PersistitLogger 
    Package Description
    com.persistit
    Implements Persistit™'s core functionality.
    com.persistit.logging
    Implements Persistit™'s logging mechanism and provides a simple method for connecting Persistit's log output to the embedding application.

    • Uses of PersistitLogger in com.persistit

      Methods in com.persistit that return PersistitLogger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistitLogger Persistit.getPersistitLogger() 
      Methods in com.persistit with parameters of type PersistitLogger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Persistit.setPersistitLogger(PersistitLogger logger)
      Replaces the current logger implementation.

    • Uses of PersistitLogger in com.persistit.logging

      Classes in com.persistit.logging that implement PersistitLogger 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApacheCommonsLogAdapter
      Wraps an org.apache.commons.logging.Log for Persistit logging.
      class  DefaultPersistitLogger
      The default implementation of logging for Persistit.
      class  JDK14LoggingAdapter
      Wraps a JDK 1.4 java.util.logging.Logger for Persistit logging.
      class  Log4JAdapter
      Wraps a Log4J org.apache.log4j.Logger for Persistit logging.
      class  Slf4jAdapter
      Wraps an org.slf4j.Logger instance for Persistit logging.
      Methods in com.persistit.logging with parameters of type PersistitLogger 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void LogBase.configure(PersistitLogger logger) 
      void PersistitLogMessage.LogItem.configure(PersistitLogger logger, PersistitLevel level, String message)
      Modify this LogItem to use the supplied PersistitLogger.
